name: Xigen Ltd
tagline: Digital design agency with creative flair.
description:
Xigen is a full service digital design agency based in both Bedfordshire and Norfolk, working with an exciting range of clients, large and small alike, our clients range from start-ups to multi-national corporate organisations like Epson, NHBC, Acal and Oxfam. Xigen can handle full branding, ECommerce, email marketing and asset transcreation across all channels throughout EMEA and beyond.
Xigen have seen substantial growth over the previous few years and are always on the lookout for new talent to join our dedicated, amazing team.
